welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bakersfield! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city, known for its rich history and thriving arts scene. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bakersfield has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Meadows Field Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Meadows Field Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
